creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: rectangular cloth folded in middle; when folded, the top of each flap is embroidered with fuchsia flowers; back side is made of light pink fabric with floral print; both flaps have blue tassels; tassels are white in the middle
title: Apron
